Description: Solid-cast copper alloy ritual figure of a naked and bound male prisoner lying on his front; inscribed with Meroitic text reading 'This is the king of the Nubians'
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Meroë (historic - Nubia), Royal City Site 299
Curator's comments: Published: Africa in Antiquity vol.2, Brooklyn 1978, p. 218 [139].

Published: Rilly, C. 2008. 'Enemy Brothers. Kinship and Relationship between Meroites and Nubians (Noba)', in W. Godlewski and A. Lajtar (eds). Between the Cataracts, Part one, Warsaw, 211-225. [pg. 216]
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Robert Ludwig Mond
